message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IT, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses connected operators, which are commonly used in computer vision and image processing. The focus is on tree-based image representations, which are often used in these fields. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses shape spaces, which is a topic in computer graphics and geometric modeling, making cs.GR (Graphics) another likely sub-category. The use of connected filters and attributes suggests cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.IT (Information Theory) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the proposal of novel connected operators falls under the scope of cs.LG (Machine Learning).
